about_the_game:
Introduction

StreamAlertsTV amplifies any Twitch creator’s stream through interactive games with the audience or even disruptive objects falling from the sky! This customizable application allows you to construct exactly how you want your stream to look and feel.

How Does It Work?

StreamAlertsTV provides a transparent overlay that can be seamlessly integrated into your stream. Whether you are Just Chatting or playing a game, these alerts will selfishly make their way into your field of view. For example, your viewers use their channel points and disrupt the stream by throwing a smoke bomb to make that final boss a little bit more challenging. 

Customize

Surprise your viewers with something new each time you go live! You can freely adjust the objects, animations, visual effects, sound effects, and fonts to meet your stream preferences.

Disruptive

Your audience is responsible for enhancing your streaming experience with StreamAlertsTV. At any moment, they can disrupt your stream with Twitch notifications or even a short game. While you stream, viewers can recognize their power to make you lose your focus throughout competitive gameplay unless you do not want those kinds of shenanigans. After all, you can control the chaos!

Alerts: 

Give your objects amusing physics, behavior, and lots of cool shit!

Games

Let your audience troll with prompt a fun game for you to play mid-focus..hehehe..

Lights Out! 

A gamified surprise! One moment, you'll see everything on-screen. Another moment, it appears the lights are out. The screen has been entirely dimmed to black! A community member must have turned it off... Only your mouse illuminates a small area. Use it, and hurry! Find the switch!

The Inspiration

Seeing Twitch streamers, like CodeMiko and DoigSwift, use game engines to transform their streams with immersive, interactive experiences inspired us to develop a user-friendly version that brings similar possibilities to more creators. With StreamAlertsTV, creators can boost engagement, interaction, and fun in their communities in an accessible way.

Twitch Extension

Easily display the options to disrupt the game with Bits in the extension Screen Alerts.

Entertaining

StreamAlertsTV allows any community member to interact and impact your gameplay experience. As a creator, knowing that this can happen at any moment, you could potentially see yourself playing your games differently. You may look for places to stay safe until you forget about it, and that is when they get you!

Why develop another Alert system?

Nearly every Twitch Streamer has a form of animated notification for new followers, subscribers, donations, etc. The problem? Redundancy. Our idea in transforming this issue was to utilize the advantages of a game engine to ensure each alert is unique and expressive for loyal viewers!

Why should I Switch?

Your current alerts go unnoticed or maybe you downloaded the free, mainstream pack that everyone else has. Nothing stands out. The experience is therefore mundane! Imagine if you could earn more money because the experience has some kick, some fun, and lots of laughs. These experiences are for those timeless clips that are rewarding for viewers and Twitch streamers.

*** StreamAlertsTV requires a Twitch Account! ***

short_description: StreamAlertsTV is a customizable alert system designed for Twitch creators! Notifications, such as new followers, subscribers, and cheers, can be displayed through quirky objects, epic VFX, and flashy animations. Enhance your stream with unique interactions and gamified experiences!
